name: Polymega Collection Vol. 5: Bad Dudes
summary:
Bad Dudes exemplified the popularity of side-scrolling action games during the late 1980s, a genre that was a staple of arcade culture. Its straightforward, action-packed gameplay and cooperative multiplayer made it an accessible and appealing title for players of all skill levels.

Here, we present to you in its original arcade as well as home console editions the original Bad Dudes, as well as Crude Buster, aka Two Crude Dudes -- it’s post-apocalyptic spiritual successor.
